mcq.statement: Which motorway links Burhan Interchange near Hasan Abdal with several cities in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa including Haripur and Thakot?
mcq.one_liner: The M15 Hazara Motorway links **Burhan Interchange near Hasan Abdal in Punjab with Haripur, Havelian, Abbottabad, Mansehra, Battagram and Thakot in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa**.
